name: Shadow of Something
developer: Fun Ghost's Haunted Fun Factory LLC
publisher: Fun Ghost's Haunted Fun Factory LLC
description: In the year 19XX, a mysterious disaster at the S-CORP lab forces the citizens of CITY S to abandon their homes and workplaces. Not long after, reports of strange phenomenon in the area emerged and crews of organized mercs and foolhardy looters began to stake their claims...
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
